quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Grease
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, bourne, jason. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In several scenes of the Bourne movies Bourne is shown to be adept at fighting using sticks, batons, and bats. Which combat system teaches this skill?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Escrima

questions.question: The two main groups of students in the movie Grease 2 are The Pink Ladies and this boys group.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The T-Birds

questions.question: In which Bourne movie/movies is there a shootout  in Moscow?

options.text: The Bourne Identity and The Bourne Ultimatum
The Bourne Ultimatum and Bourne Supremacy

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Bourne Ultimatum and Bourne Supremacy

questions.question: Jason Bournes girlfriend from the first two Bourne movies starring Matt Damon, does not appear in The Bourne Ultimatum.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who plays Nicky, the CIA  technician in both The Bourne Identity  and The Bourne Supremacy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Julia Stiles

questions.question: In The Bourne Ultimatum, the character played by David Straihtirn, is trying to start his own operation. What is ti called?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blackbriar

questions.question: Who portrays the villain, Alexander Conklin in the 2002 movie The Bourne Identity?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chris Cooper

questions.question: Richard Chamberlain has portrayed Jason Bourne.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which statement is true about the movie The Bourne Identity?

options.text: The movie takes place in flashbacks.
The movies was rated R for its violence.
The guards in the US Embassy scene were all top stuntmen.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: There are no opening credits.

questions.question: Which actress portrayed Jason Bournes girlfriend in The Bourne Identity?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Franke Potente

questions.question: The character in the original Grease movie, known affectionately as Craterface, also appears in Grease 2 as the head of the bad guy motorcycle gang. In Grease 2 , they also refer to him as Craterface, but more often he is called by this name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Balmudo

questions.question: Which of these actors turned down the role of Jason Bourne?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brad Pitt

questions.question: What year did the movie Grease 2 come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1982

questions.question: What was the name of the CIA operation in which Bourne was involved in the film The Bourne Identity?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Treadstone

questions.question: After Michael finds out what kind of guy Stephanie wants in the movie Grease 2, he saves up money to buy something to impress her by doing which of the following?

options.text: writing papers for members of the boys group
working at the local malt shop

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: writing papers for members of the boys group

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Grease
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What happens to the mysterious biker in Grease 2 (who has Stephanie enamored of him) after the guys chase him from the June Moon Talent Contest?

options.text: He runs into a tree and is rushed to the hospital with extreme bodily injuries.
He gives up and reveals his identity to everyone.
He does wheelies and tricks with his motorcycle and then disappears really quickly down the street.
They make him jump his bike through a construction site and he is presumed dead.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They make him jump his bike through a construction site and he is presumed dead.

questions.question: What African American actor starred as Sidney Deane in the 1992 movie White Men Cant Jump?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wesley Snipes

questions.question: What country is involved together with the US in the plot of the 1995 movie Crimson Tide?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Russia

questions.question: What pet name were Warner and Elle using for each other in the 2001 American comedy Legally Blonde?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pooh Bear

questions.question: What disease takes the life of Nicole Kidmans character, Satine, in the 2001 musical Moulin Rouge!?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tuberculosis

questions.question: What title was initially considered for the Greys Anatomy TV series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Complications

questions.question: What are all galaxies contained within according to the final scene of the 1997 comedy Men in Black?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marbles

questions.question: How does the movie Grease 2 tie in with the movie Grease?

options.text: Rizzo from Grease is Paulettes mother.
The only similarities are Crater-Face, Principal Mcgee and Blanche.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael is Sandy Olssons cousin.

questions.question: What kind of animal is Mr. Jingles who was resurrected by John in the 1999 movie The Green Mile?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mouse

questions.question: What is the Pink Panther from the 2006 comedy movie The Pink Panther?

options.text: The stage name of a female performer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A pink diamond

questions.question: What female artist performed the theme song of the 1995 Bond movie GoldenEye?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tina Turner

questions.question: What is the name of the paradisal land under the sea in the 1968 animated film Yellow Submarine?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pepperland

questions.question: In the movie Grease 2, the day after the talent contest, the school holds a Rock-a-Hula Luau. Of course, Craterface and his gang appear to ruin the festivities. Who appears to save the day and chase the bad guys away?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the mystery biker

questions.question: Though this action movie takes place in Egypt, it couldnt be shot in Egypt due to the countrys unstable political conditions.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Mummy

questions.question: This 1999 movie was written and directed by M. Night Shyamalan.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sixth Sense

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Film and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, college, professor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Jean Shepherd narrated A Christmas Story and its sequel My Summer Story.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who was considered to play the role of The Old Man in the film A Christmas Story?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Nicholson

questions.question: Brad Pitt was offered the lead role in this Tim Burton movie that was criticized for its violence and bloodshed.

options.text: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sleepy Hollow

questions.question: The author of the book that inspired A Christmas Story, Jean Shepherd, narrated the film.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Director Bob Clark made a cameo in the film A Christmas Story.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This film is about the 5 Lisbon sisters who lived in Grosse Pointe, Michigan in the 1970s.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Virgin Suicides

questions.question: This film, set in 1930s Louisiana, was adapted from a novel of the same name and directed by Frank Darabont.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Green Mile

questions.question: What role did Jean Shepherd play in the film A Christmas Story?

options.text: Man at the Department store who shows Ralphie and Randy the end of the line
Jean Shepherd did not appear in this film.
Man who sells The Old Man their Christmas tree

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Man at the Department store who shows Ralphie and Randy the end of the line

questions.question: What is Ralphies fathers first name in the film A Christmas Story?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: What is the name of the character in the film A Christmas Story who questions The Old Man about the leg lamp?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Swede

questions.question: This movie, shot in Ontario, is about 4 high schoolers and their attempts to see KISS in concert.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Detroit Rock City

questions.question: In this film a widowed college professor suspects his neighbors of terrorism.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arlington Road

questions.question: In this movie an English auctioneer unwittingly gets involved with his fiances mob family.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mickey Blue Eyes

questions.question: In this movie, a high schoolers family and friends become convinced she is homosexual and send her to a residential therapy camp to cure her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: But Im a Cheerleader

questions.question: This Michael Mann movie was adapted from the Vanity Fair article The Man Who Knew Too Much by Marie Brenner.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Insider

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Scene
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, table, scene. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In this movie Santa Claus and “Cloudy” Russo rough up the punk, demanding to know if he “ever picks his feet in Poughkeepsie.”
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The French Connection

questions.question: Prewitt squares off with “Fatso” Borgnine in a back-ally knife fight and avenges Maggio’s murder in this 1953 movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From Here to Eternity

questions.question: In this movie Alvy comes to his ex-girlfriend’s rescue and heroically battles the spider in her bathroom with a tennis racquet.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Annie Hall

questions.question: What Hollywood actress portrayed Dorothy in the 1939 film The Wizard of Oz?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Judy Garland

questions.question: Gondorff staggers to the table declaring, “Sorry I’m late, I was takin’ a crap!” and sits opposite Lonnegan. This is a scene from which movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sting

questions.question: He confesses to the General that there was something disturbing about personally executing Gassim. It was not the blood  . . . “No, not that, something else; I enjoyed it.” Name the movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lawrence of Arabia

questions.question: Shears approaches through the water with a knife in hand, preparing to kill his overly idealistic ally. Both utter the word “You!” . . . one from surprised recognition, the other with disdain. The scene is from this movie.

options.text: The Bridge Over the River Kwai

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Bridge Over the River Kwai

questions.question: In this movie, a crushed and dying Steven Boyd hisses to the victorious Jew to seek his family “in the valley of the lepers!”

options.text: The Fall of the Roman Empire

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ben Hur

questions.question: What is the nickname of Marilyn Monroes character in the 1959 film Some Like It Hot?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sugar

questions.question: In what movie does Father Barry get crushed by a falling crate, after preaching to his flock of stevedores to oppose local crime boss Johnnie Friendly.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: On the Waterfront

questions.question: The semi-autobiographical short stories which A Christmas Story was based on were originally published in what magazine in 1964-1966?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Playboy

questions.question: While playing gin rummy in the final scene of this movie, C.C. Baxter confesses his love for Fran, who simply tells him to “Shut up and deal.”
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Apartment

questions.question: In this movie Ray Millands character, who suffers a writer’s block, scours his apartment for that bottle of rye he just doesn’t remember finishing.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Lost Weekend

questions.question: What celebrated film director worked on the 1960 horror movie Psycho?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alfred Hitchcock

questions.question: After losing his hands in WW2, Homer, one of the main characters in this Oscar-winning movie, tries to push his girlfriend away by demonstrating how difficult life with him would be.

options.text: The Best Years of Our Lives

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Best Years of Our Lives

options.text: They manage to escape once again.

questions.question: In the comedy movie Planes, Trains  Automobiles, what was the name of the car rental business that rented Steve Martins character a car at the St. Louis airport?

questions.question: What was the name of John Candys character in the movie Planes, Trains  Automobiles?

They put him in a zoo.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Nazis

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Razzie and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Sir Laurence Olivier won a Razzie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which Star Wars villain has green and blue lightsabers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: General Grievous

questions.question: This actress won The Worst Actress Razzie in 1986, 1987, 1993, 2000 and 2002.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Madonna

questions.question: This Alan Carr movie was the first movie to win the Razzie for Years Worst Movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cant Stop the Music

questions.question: Which of the following is not among the actors who have won both an Oscar and a Razzie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gregory Peck

questions.question: How many arms does General Grievous have?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4

questions.question: What Star Wars character on the Dark Side has a double lightsaber?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Darth Maul

questions.question: On what planet does Star Wars character Ki-Ai-Mundi die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mygeeto

questions.question: What does John Candys character do for a living in the film Planes, Trains  Automobiles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shower curtain ring salesman

questions.question: This actor is the first one  to win 10 Razzies.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sylvester Stallone

questions.question: What movie won 5 Razzies in 2000?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wild Wild West

questions.question: At the end of the movie Planes, Trains  Automobiles, the the two main characters go to the bus station in Chicago and then go separate ways.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: At least twice an actor/actress has been nominated for a Razzie and an Oscar for the same performance. Who was the first actress to achieve this distinction?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amy Irving

questions.question: Who created the Golden Raspberry Awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John J.W. Wilson

questions.question: How many Star Wars movies is Obi-Wan alive in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4
